mapper.select:
select aha.applyinst_id applyinstId, bdr.REGION_NAME regionName, bdr.region_id regionId from aea_hi_applyinst aha LEFT JOIN aea_applyinst_proj aap on aap.applyinst_id = aha.applyinst_id LEFT JOIN aea_proj_info api on api.proj_info_id = aap.proj_info_id and api.root_org_id =#{rootOrgId} LEFT JOIN bsc_dic_region bdr on bdr.region_id = api.REGIONALISM where 1=1
and aha.CREATE_TIME >= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{startTime},' 00:00:01'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and aha.CREATE_TIME <= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and aha.IS_DELETED='0' and bdr.REGION_NAME is not null and aha.root_org_id = #{rootOrgId}

select ttt.*, aib.item_name as itemName, org.org_name as orgName, (select count(1) from aea_hi_iteminst where ITEM_VER_ID = ttt.itemVerId) as totalCount from ( select itemVerId, sum(noAccept) as noAcceptCount, sum(overdue) as overdueCount from ( select itemVerId, case iteminstState when '5' then 1 else 0 end as noAccept, case when remainNum <= 0 then 1 else 0 end as overdue from ( select ahi.ITEM_VER_ID as itemVerId, ahi.ITEMINST_STATE as iteminstState, IFNULL(asti.REMAINING_TIME, 1) AS remainNum from aea_hi_iteminst ahi left join act_sto_timerule_inst asti on asti.PROC_INST_ID = ahi.PROCINST_ID left join aea_item_basic aib on ahi.ITEM_VER_ID = aib.ITEM_VER_ID where ahi.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId}) t where iteminstState = '5' or remainNum <= 0 ) tt group by itemVerId) ttt left join aea_item_basic aib on ttt.itemVerId = aib.ITEM_VER_ID left join opu_om_org org on aib.ORG_ID = org.ORG_ID
select from opu_om_user_org oou LEFT JOIN opu_om_org org on org.org_id = oou.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN bsc_dic_region bdr on bdr.REGION_ID = org.REGION_ID where oou.USER_ID = #{currentUserId}

select gg.regionId, gg.regionName, gg.instState,count(*) receiptCount
, gg.orgId ,gg.orgName
from ( select ahi.APPROVE_ORG_ID orgId, org.REGION_ID regionId, org.ORG_NAME orgName, bdr.REGION_NAME regionName ,asti.INST_STATE instState from aea_hi_iteminst ahi LEFT JOIN opu_om_org org on org.org_id = ahi.APPROVE_ORG_ID LEFT JOIN bsc_dic_region bdr on bdr.REGION_ID = org.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN act_sto_timerule_inst asti on asti.PROC_INST_ID = ahi.PROCINST_ID
where ahi.ACCEPT_TIME >= #{startTime} and ahi.ACCEPT_TIME <= #{endTime} and asti.INST_STATE is not null )gg
gg.regionId = #{regionId}
GROUP BY gg.regionId ,gg.instState
,gg.orgId

select gg.REGION_ID regionId, gg.REGION_NAME regionName,
gg.APPROVE_ORG_ID orgId, gg.ORG_NAME orgName,
count(*) correctMaterialCount, 0 receiptCount, 0 acceptCount, 0 notAcceptCount from ( SELECT ahi.APPROVE_ORG_ID, org.ORG_NAME, org.REGION_ID, brd.REGION_NAME from aea_log_item_state_hist alish LEFT JOIN aea_hi_iteminst ahi on ahi.ITEMINST_ID = alish.ITEMINST_ID LEFT JOIN opu_om_org org on org.ORG_ID = ahi.APPROVE_ORG_ID LEFT JOIN bsc_dic_region brd on brd.REGION_ID = org.REGION_ID where alish.TRIGGER_TIME >= #{startTime} and alish.TRIGGER_TIME <= #{endTime} and alish.NEW_STATE= #{newState} and alish.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId} and ahi.ROOT_ORG_ID= #{rootOrgId} )gg
gg.REGION_ID = #{regionId}
GROUP by gg.REGION_ID
, gg.APPROVE_ORG_ID
mapper.sql: org.ORG_ID as orgId, org.ORG_CODE as orgCode, org.ORG_NAME as orgName, org.ORG_SHORT_NAME1 as orgShortName1, org.ORG_SHORT_NAME2 as orgShortName2, org.PARENT_ORG_ID as parentOrgId, org.ORG_LEVEL as orgLevel, org.ORG_SEQ as orgSeq, org.ORG_SORT_NO as orgSortNo, org.IS_PUBLIC as isPublic, org.ORG_PROPERTY as orgProperty, org.IS_INNER_CATEGORY_EXPAND as isInnerCategoryExpand, org.IS_ACTIVE as isActive, org.IS_LEAF as isLeaf, org.SUB_UNIT_COUNT as subUnitCount, org.SUB_DEPT_COUNT as subDeptCount, org.SUB_GROUP_COUNT as subGroupCount, org.SUB_POS_COUNT as subPosCount, org.SUB_USER_COUNT as subUserCount, org.ORG_TYPE as orgType, org.ORG_NATURE as orgNature, org.ORG_RANK as orgRank, org.UNIT_GB_TYPE as unitGbType, org.UNIT_GB_CODE as unitGbCode, org.UNIT_GB_SYS_CODE as unitGbSysCode, org.ORG_FUNDS_FORM as orgFundsForm, org.ORG_FOUND_TIME as orgFoundTime, org.ORG_LINK_MAN as orgLinkMan, org.ORG_LINK_TEL as orgLinkTel, org.ORG_ZIP_CODE as orgZipCode, org.ORG_EMAIL as orgEmail, org.ORG_TEL as orgTel, org.ORG_ADDRESS as orgAddress, org.ORG_WEBSITE as orgWebsite, org.ORG_WEIBO as orgWeibo, org.ORG_APPROVAL_NUMBER as orgApprovalNumber, org.ORG_FUNC as orgFunc, org.ORG_DELETED as orgDeleted, org.CREATER as creater, org.CREATE_TIME as createTime, org.MODIFIER as modifier, org.MODIFY_TIME as modifyTime, org.IS_TOP_ORG as isTopOrg, org.region_id as regionId

${alias}.REGION_ID regionId, ${alias}.PARENT_REGION_ID parentRegionId, ${alias}.REGION_NAME regionName, ${alias}.FIRST_LETTER firstLetter, ${alias}.REGION_FULL_NAME regionFullName, ${alias}.REGION_STATUS regionStatus, ${alias}.REGIONAL_LEVEL regionalLevel, ${alias}.REGION_SEQ regionSeq, ${alias}.REGION_NUM regionNum, ${alias}.REGION_OLD_NUM regionOldNum, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.REGION_TYPE as regionType, ${alias}.REGION_PINYIN as regionPinyin
